txt.en: Disarm the Enemy's casks in the cisterns and defeat the Morgul forces\n<rgb=#FF0000>Defeating the Morgul Captain will end this quest</rgb>

Morgul-orcs and goblins have snuck into the cisterns beneath Minas Tirith, hoping to destroy it from below while the forces of Gondor are occupied upon the wall.

This quest starts with <rgb=#FFFF00>empty</rgb> Merit Rating.

<rgb=#00FF00>Merit Gain:</rgb>
* Defuse powder casks throughout the cisterns of Minas Tirith
* Defuse giant powder casks before sappers can detonate them
* Defeat the Morgul Captain leading the forces under Minas Tirith
Disarm the Enemy's casks in the cisterns and defeat the Morgul forces\n<rgb=#FF0000>Defeating the Morgul Captain will end this quest</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>Do not allow all the hornblowers to alert reinforcements.</rgb>
[placeholder] Small, medium, or large powder casks disarmed
Morgul-orcs and goblins have snuck into the cisterns beneath Minas Tirith, hoping to destroy it from below while the forces of Gondor are occupied upon the wall.
